svg.text: My Name is Mubashir and I like AI
svg.script:
<
![CDATA[
      const words = ["AI", "Coding", "Open Source", "Web Development"];
      let index = 0;
      const wordEl = document.getElementById("word");

      function cycleWords() {
        wordEl.textContent = words[index];
        index = (index + 1) % words.length;
      }

      setInterval(cycleWords, 2000);
    ]]>
